Name: Rayleigh & Ramsay
Review Text: Our first restaurant and bar after the lockdown and so so happy we stopped by. Even with its 100+ selection of wines they make the process easy to Uber tans and fun, or just have a nice cold beer. The menu (for Amsterdam) is surprisingly fresh and unique. I‚Äôll def be back again and again.

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Trendy wine bar. However, you can also drink coffee. The highlight of the restaurant is that you can not only choose your wine with a chip card but also fill your glass yourself. ‚Ä¶
